deepforest.deepforest module¶

class deepforest.deepforest.deepforest(weights='default')[source]¶

Bases: object

Overall class for training and predicting images

download_release()[source]¶

Download the latest model release from github release Returns:

str: “path to downloaded weights on disk”

predict(image)[source]¶

Predict tree crowns in an image Args:

image (np.array): Image numpy array

A training model.

Train a deep learning model for tree crown detection

Predict an image return_plot: Logical. If true, return a image object, else return bounding boxes
